briefTitle: Multiple B-value Diffusion-weighted Imaging(DWI) in Evaluation of Breast Lesions
officialTitle: Multiple B-value Diffusion-weighted Imaging in Evaluation of Breast Lesions：Compare Biexponential Model, Stretched Exponential Model, Conventional Monoexponential DWI and Pathological Specimens.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The values of Apparent diffusion coefficient (ADC, mm^2/s), tissue diffusivity (D, mm^2/s), pseudo-diffusion coefficient (D*, mm^ 2/s) measured from the DWI image
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patient with breast lesion (Breast Imaging Reporting and Data System 2,3,4,5)
* Operation is take in Tang-du hospital

Exclusion Criteria:

* Postoperative patient
* Suffer radiotherapy,chemotherapy and endocrine treatment
* Serious image artifacts
* Lesion with diameter less than 3mm
* Scan during menstrual period
* Other magnetic resonance imaging contraindications
